title: WebLogic Training
description: Mindmajix Oracle WebLogic Training develops your skills and expertise to implement Oracle WebLogic Server solutions. The participant will gain hands-on experience in installing, configuring, and administering WebLogic Server 12c and its components. This certification course covers topics such as system architecture, deployment, and post-install configurations with the best practices. The course is geared toward developers, architects, or administrators who are looking for a solid understanding of WebLogic concepts and how to spin up a WebLogic environment quickly.
what_will_learn: |Understanding of basic WebLogic concepts|Installing WebLogic|Creating a WebLogic domain|Accessing the WebLogic admin console|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the Weblogic course?The prerequisites for learning this course are listed below:
Basic knowledge of,

Web development and 
Application servers.

title: JBoss Training
description: Mindmajix’s JBoss Training teaches the best practices to install and configure the JBoss  Enterprise Application Platform. Our instructors will help you understand advanced JBoss EAP concepts and administrative tasks. The course is geared toward architects, developers, or administrators who are looking to know fundamental to expert level on JBoss. Through hands-on exercises, you’ll learn the essential to deploy and manage apps on JBoss EAP and become ready to take the JBoss Certification exam.
what_will_learn: |Install and Configure JBOSS EAP|Understand the CLI tool and Datasource Subsystem|Learn Messaging and Logging subsystem|Configure Hosts and Servers|	 |

title: JBoss Administration Training
description: Accelerate your career as a certified JBoss Administrator by mastering all the concepts of this open-source application server with real-time examples. Our training will walk you through the key fundamentals of JBoss and also provides in-depth knowledge on how to install, configure, administer, and deploy applications effectively on the JBoss Enterprise Application Platform with industry use cases and projects. Enrol now and get certified.

What are the prerequisites to take JBoss Administration training?Experience with the following will be beneficial:

System administration on UNIX, Microsoft Windows, and Linux Operating Systems, and understanding of networking and hardware.

title: JBoss Application Server Training
description: Mindmajix JBoss Application Server course covers all the important administrative tasks that are required to administer this new version of JBoss AS. It starts with installation, architecture, and basic configuration and monitoring. You will also learn the structure and contents of the underlying XML configuration files that reflect the actual configuration. The course also covers the use of JBoss in standalone mode and explains the new domain model for managing multiple JBoss nodes from a single management point. The last part of the course delves into the details of clustering JBoss for high availability and load balancing, as well as going into the details of setting up and managing a JBoss domain with the new domain model.
prerequisites:
Who should take the JBoss Application Server course?




The JBoss Application Server training is best suited for the following professionals:


Java EE Developers
Application Server Administrators
Software Engineer
And the Aspirants who want to build their career in this field
